website_summaries.verdict: Easily add a fountain to any pool of water in your yard with this reliable solar-powered fountain.
pros: It floats on the water and is powered by the sun
Fun for a lot of water applications.Can work even if the sun is not bright
Includes attachments for the bottom if you do not want it to float
Does not need electricity, batteries, or wires
Safe for fish, birds, and humans
cons: Plastic parts might not hold up well through winter weather and will need to be brought indoors for storage

customer_reviews.title: Cute addition to garden
customer_reviews.text: This solar fountain was easy to use - simply attach the desired spray nozzle and put it in water (in sunshine). It works really well, especially in full sun. My minor complaints are that it float (by design), so I had to use twine to jerry rig it to remain at the center of my bird bath; and the water tends to spray everywhere, such that I have to refill the bath with water multiple times a day. On the plus side, the birds to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Good amount of sprinkle
customer_reviews.text: This is a very easy to use fountain pump. Your bird bath cannot be too shallow for it to float. It comes with many options of sprays. There is a small spacer bar that lifts the sprinkler head up higher. I found the head works better without that. Many different options to try.
customer_reviews.author: Sherlock

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: it started working immediately from box to fountain. it would not stay centered, and the bowl was losing water several times a day. we only use the very short piece, and it was still floating to side of bowl, and water was being emptied very quickly. i ordered a 2.5 iron disc (used for weight lifting), and attached it on the bottom with 2 rubber bands! now it stays centered. it also works fine without direct sunlight. we are pleased with it especially for the price. if you want yours centered, and your bowl is deep enough, this is the weight i purchased
customer_reviews.author: Marta M. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Working Great So Far
customer_reviews.text: It’s only been three days, but this little fountain has been working great so far. The bird bath where it sits eventually becomes shady in the late afternoon, but the fountain keeps running off the battery for a few hours. So it performing exactly as I hoped it would. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Now that the sun is out and charging up the batteries, it is working beautifully. Be aware the fountain of water dies back when no sun. That is normal. Am very pleased with this item, excellent value for the price! Vendor's rep even emailed, offering replacement if the fountain did not work. It doesn't get any better than that!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Downey

customer_reviews.title: Was good while it lasted, we have a stupid dog.
customer_reviews.text: Placed my solar fountain in a very large bird bath the day I received it. It immediately started working as advertised and I was pleased. Thanks to my 4 year old grandson and OR my daughters stupid 6 month old puppy, it somehow made its way out of the bird bath and into the yard...I found it chewed all to pieces. I may order again later on once I figure out how to keep this from happening again. Hope all of you have better luck than I did.
customer_reviews.author: BKA_30624

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working *UPDATED*
customer_reviews.text: This was a great fountain and worked very well for three days. Now suddenly it's stopped working. It has no debris and has been floating in water the whole time. Very disappointed, we really loved it while it was working. UPDATE: The Customer Service was quick to respond to my email and mailed out a replacement fountain. This one has been working flawlessly for several weeks now. I’m pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Renovating Queen

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: We received the Hiluckey Solar Bird Bath Fountain Pump a few days ago. Everything came as expected. The parts all snap together easily. All we had to do was choose which style water display we wanted, remove the protective covering, and put it in the bird bath. Even though it's been rainy and cloudy, the pump still worked. Now that the sun is out, the water spout shoots continuously and quite high. We love it so much I've ordered 2 more for my other birdbaths. Order one (or two), you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Product Not as Described
customer_reviews.text: The description states, "...With this monitoring system, the fountain will work or shut off automatically according to the water level..." I specifically chose this one because of this feature. However, when I received the fountain, the instructions state, "Don't make the pump work without water for a long time. Dehydration will wear the parts of the pump to shorten the lifespan" I will return - not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I had to make my adjustments as our bird bath is small and when I use the various nozzles, the water shoots up too much and the bath becomes empty quickly. If it is windy then the stream will make the water splash out more. Our birth bath is about 17 inches in diameter. I did not use any nozzles in the end and it just had water pumping out very low. My goal anyway was to have some moving water to prevent mosquito eggs but if the fountain was able to contain some of the water it would have been a nice view. The suction also sometimes does not work and we find the fountain floating around.
customer_reviews.author: NewBabyDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Great in sunny climates.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, takes 5-10 minutes, if reading instructions. Suction didnt work on my terra cota, but it might stick better on smooth ceramic. As other reviewers mentioned, I did need to place a few stones in bath to keep it from floating around. Only negative is it needs constant sun to work. Wouldnt reccomend if you live in rainy or cloudy climates. I will follow up later this summer to see how well it withstands the Arizona heat.
customer_reviews.author: C. Houser

customer_reviews.title: I'd still recommend, just got a bad one
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a few and the last one only worked for 3 days, I kept because it's still a hiding place for my fish''
customer_reviews.author: carol hull

customer_reviews.title: Makes lovely sounds
customer_reviews.text: I got this to put in our plastic bird bath that we keep with the RV. Were able to use it during spring break and it provided such a nice relaxing sound! It’s so easy to use that my husband had it put together and in the bird bath before I even finished setting up inside. It comes with a couple of different spray nozzles which makes it fun to play around with. Works very well even in partly sunny skies.
customer_reviews.author: Kcuret

customer_reviews.title: Keeps water circulating at a good price
customer_reviews.text: We're happy with the purchase, which keeps water circulating in a birdbath to discourage mosquitoes. We had hoped to give the birds a bit of a shower, but the suction cups keep coming off the bottom, and it starts floating. We haven't yet figured out which attachments connect to make a short spray, and the longer spray ends up splashing out to empty the birdbath in about an hour, so we just keep it to a low bubble.
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: Quality seems mixed
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these and it worked well (still works, in fact). Bought a second one and it barely worked/never worked properly. We missed the return window but are pretty bummed. We noticed the second one was slightly different from the first. Either way, it seems the quality is mixed. I would recommend buying with caution and being prepared to return if it doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: izzy_izo

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me; but a little big
customer_reviews.text: This fountain in a cute addition to my backyard; but it's a little big for the birdbath that I have it in. It fits fine in the birdbath; it's just that the spray (and I've tried all nozzles) shoots the water out & I have to keep refilling the bath. I'm ordering the mini in the hope that will remedy the problem. I haven't decided if I'm going to return, or find a new use for it.
customer_reviews.author: jBo

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure about the birds, but I love this fountain I ordered for my bird bath. I was skeptical because of it being solar, but if you check out my video it is amazing!! I have this right outside the window and love hearing the water and the fountain running. The only con is it does run out of water and you have to watch that you keep the bird bath filled up with water, but that isn’t a big deal. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Keene Family

customer_reviews.title: Does meet my expectations for use in a bird bath
customer_reviews.text: This is really cool when it is working, but it only runs, at most, a couple of hours. This is in due to the safety power off when the water level reaches less than two inches. This happens quicker than I expected due to the splash radius. I have mine in a bird bath that carries about four inches of water. Everytime it stops the safety mechanism needs to be reset by adding water and covering the unit with a dark towel for a few seconds. It might work all day in a pool or small water garden. Some of the spray heads do not work properly, with water only come through a few of the holes.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the garden!
customer_reviews.text: I got the fountain without the battery back up and it works just like described. It really adds movement to my garden and I love that! It comes with several tips for different effects so that's nice. The one with the battery back up may be better because it stops if it is cloudy or as soon as the sun goes down.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Floats in birdbath, pond or pool and gives a great stream of water. Perfect for chickens or kids :)
customer_reviews.text: This may sound weird but I bought this for my chickens! They love water and I wanted to give them something fun and keep them entertained. Of course my girls love it too and is perfect for sunny days. I love that it’s solar and I don’t have to worry about plugging it in or charging it. I currently have it in a small kiddy pool for the chickens but I’m going to have to order another for my girls to use as a sprinkler!!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Kubacka

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: It worked at first and stopped working in a day, and when we restarted it per instructions, it worked for a few hours and stopped again. Once it started again on its own, but hasn't work since then at all - we've had it for about a month, days have been sunny.
customer_reviews.author: CStewart

customer_reviews.title: It will pump your money away for you
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with the product. The pump is fine when it decides to run. Only runs for less than an hour and only in the early morning. 6am - 7am before anyone can see it running. For the money it is a bust. I wish I never bought it.
customer_reviews.author: CyberPunk

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very fun addition to my garden. I love hearing the sound of the water splashing and the birds enjoy taking baths. It does require full sun for the fountain to work. It will also work for a short time from stored solar energy once it's not in the sun. I received it quickly. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: C Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love this in my birdbath
customer_reviews.text: This looks great in my birdbath. I like using the adapters to change the look of the water fountain. The first one I bought broke within a day but the return was easy and they sent me a replacement right away. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work In the area I had a bird bath in
customer_reviews.text: Wanted this too work so badly. The directions aren’t very clear. I put it in the sun and then put it in the bird bath nothing happened. No fountain. I then reread the directions and covered it with a pillow for 60 seconds then it worked when I put it in the fountain. The next day it was just sputtering water out here and there. Maybe it needs full sun for it to work. My birdbath is in the shade under a tree. When it was working it looked pretty. The only problem is that you can’t have too much water or it floats around the bird bath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for birdbath circulation.
customer_reviews.text: I run it without any attachments to circulate the birdbath. In shade it kind of "pulses" and in full sun it maintains a nice flow. I've tried using some of the spray attachments, but they just shoot the water out of the birdbath. Easy to clean, and outperforms a $60 solar fountain from my local bird seed store.
customer_reviews.author: RKD

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: continues to work and surprisingly the fountain head does not get clogged. Great value for the money., I was very impressed. I did not have great hope since the price was so low, but was pleasantly surprised when it arrived, went together very easily and worked and has continued to work
customer_reviews.author: JRINC

customer_reviews.title: Bought it in June, stopped working yesterday (90 days!) :-(
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this little solar fountain. I bought it for a large bird bath to keep the water moving so mosquitoes don't lay eggs. Worked very well. Yesterday it wasn't working. Checked it today, made sure the pump is clean, the water is clean, it's in full sun and nothing. Very very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: 2MaineCoons

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: The price is right and it works. It needs a deep birdbath or it will run out of water. It is lightly made and must be treated with care. The top broke off immediately, but I made’ it work. It’s fun, but would be great if it were a bit sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: J. Eilers

customer_reviews.title: Sort of worked for about 3 weeks, then died.
customer_reviews.text: Even in full sun, it was unpredictable whether the fountain would work... as soon as there was mostly sunny/partly cloudy, it would spurt every 5 seconds or so. Stopped working altogether in less than a month. It was in a bird bath that was cleaned nearly daily.
customer_reviews.author: A Momma

customer_reviews.title: Maintenance Free Solar Fountain
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect gift for my mom, now she can run her bird bath in the yard without having to extend power to it. The solar panels provide enough energy to keep water flowing. The pieces are easy to assemble and the finished product looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Trotter

customer_reviews.title: Great value and works great, but...
customer_reviews.text: Unless you have a very deep bird bath the fountain pump sucks out all of the water in less than an hour. And, it absolutely must be in FULL SUN, period! If this is your situation, I highly recommend this excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality product at great price
customer_reviews.text: Huge improvement over another solar pump I had. This one floats nicely in birdbath and has string power. Attachment selection is great. Comes with clear instructions, dealer working hard to provide quality device. Very impressed and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Turner

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Item has been installed for 2 weeks which is plenty of time for charging, FYI I live in Az. Item has not worked. My experience with this item is very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Nacho16

customer_reviews.title: Solar BIrdbath Fountain
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my birdbath in the back yard. It's perfect. I have not had luck with the previous 3 designs I ordered, although they worked well for awhile but the motors burned out if the water level got too low. This solar fountain has a back-up battery AND its own built-in safety turn-off if the water level gets too low. For a little extra money (really, not much) this solar fountain should last for a long time. I highly recommend if you are looking for a small water feature addition to your yard!
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2 days and now wont run for more than a few seconds
customer_reviews.text: It has a safety shut off switch for when the water runs out and it keeps tripping. You can reset it but it only runs a few seconds before shutting off again. Plenty of water in the container and sitting in direct sun. Save your money and avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Needs strong direct sunlight
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of this but did not realize that it needs strong direct sunlight. Most of my yard is shaded so I only get an hour or so of spray. The device needs a pretty big bowl unless you just want the bubbler. I put it in a 9 inch bowl and it empied in 30 minutes. Needs 12+ inches. NIce idea not working as well as I want.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Gannon

customer_reviews.title: Cute Fontaine with accurate size
customer_reviews.text: Amazing compact solar Bird Bath Fontaine. Strong and cute size with different set of water switches. Easy to assimble and use it. Easy charging with solar panels happy❤️💋
customer_reviews.author: Adesignstore

customer_reviews.title: A FUN SUMMER GIZMO TO ASTOUND THE CROWS
customer_reviews.text: I get one every year--mine have not managed to survive storage and they don't do welling ponds with real duck week-getting clogged --but in the birdbath, they are quite amusing-even though they annoy the crows who keep trying to chuck it out--the jays are fine with it
customer_reviews.author: Janet Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Lovely fountain
customer_reviews.text: After careful scrutiny of descriptions and reviews, I chose this fountain to purchase and crossed my fingers. It arrived quickly and the price was reasonable enough. Instructions a little confusing and not that thorough, in my opinion, with all the different little attachments but if you have half a brain, it really wasn’t hard to figure it out. I set my birdbath up, filled with water and the pump started to work immediately as I was walking out the door with it. I am totally thrilled with this purchase!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my dog bird bath!
customer_reviews.text: This little fountain is exactly what I needed for my little bird bath I made. Starts up the second I put it in the bowl. Perfect for the little water feature in my garden. Birds do not come to the fountain however, but this is because my dogs chase them away. Super solid product!
customer_reviews.author: Zac Kohler

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I like the fountain but you need a huge bird bath so that the fountain doesn't drain your water out. Haven't seen one bird on it yet and it is 100 plus heat wave here!!!! Hoping the birds like it.
customer_reviews.author: LaDawn's Art and Crafts

customer_reviews.title: It REALLY Works!
customer_reviews.text: I do like this little fountain! It has a tendency to clog up if debris blows into bird bath bit easily fixed. When sun is out works great. It will send water over edge of bird bath so need to fill more often.
customer_reviews.author: Sher Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Nice birdbath fountain
customer_reviews.text: I've had it a month and it works fine, with lots of gadgets to choose from. Wish I didn't lose some water, but it's not a lot. At least my plants around the base are getting watered. :)
customer_reviews.author: L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Cute little tabletop fountain
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little tabletop fountain. Works well but must be in direct sun. It will stop working even in partial shade. I was hoping it would still work in filtered light but I still enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Linn

customer_reviews.title: Still trying to get it to work
customer_reviews.text: It shows some signs of life then dies. I have tried everything...you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: If it seems too good to be true...
customer_reviews.text: I had high hope but it only worked in fits and starts for a couple of weeks and now it does nothing. I am at least glad it was inexpensive and not much was lost on this project.
customer_reviews.author: Marge R

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but it doesn’t stop when the water runs out.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute little fountain, perfect for my birdbath. My only complaint is that the description says it will shut off when the water runs out, but it doesn’t. It keeps gasping - makes an annoying sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Fountain
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this Fountain. It has a lot of force when it gets direct sunlight. Make sure you have a wide surface area, the water shoots out with a lot of force. If you don't have enough room, the water can sprinkle out into the ground, cause water to be wasted and run out quickly. I wish there was some sort of battery pack, would be nice to see it work even when there is not direct sunlight. Regardless, I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: S. Joshi

customer_reviews.title: Solar Bird Bath Fountain with Battery Backup
customer_reviews.text: I received the fountain as scheduled. Put it together and sat it in the water where it gets full sun and it worked great for 2 days. Now it is dead. I checked to see if it was clogged and it doesn't do anything. I would like a replacement or refund
customer_reviews.author: Skip Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cool fountain
customer_reviews.text: Cool solar fountain, works great right out of the box, only thing is I thought it would be bigger to make sure it got enough sun, but I guess the solar panels/base are big enough for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Sapita

customer_reviews.title: Quit working
customer_reviews.text: Initially I liked the ease of assembly and functioning. But after a few short months it quit working. And it is no longer available or supported by the original seller.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Broke right away
customer_reviews.text: This stopped working 24 hours after I received it. I read reviews and took it apart to clean out the filter but here was nothing in the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Brittony C.

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to work in shade
customer_reviews.text: It was a little tricky getting this to activate in the water. The fountain was vibrating as soon as I took out of package, but would stop and start and nothing when I placed in my bird bath. I figured out to cover the device with a dish towel outside and place in the bird bath immediately while in the sun so that the device didn't have a chance to stop running and that did the trick. It's been several days and works great with out any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little fountain
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? The fountain has several different spray heads, each one is different and charming. As soon as I put it in the sun, it began working. Hopefully the birds will enjoy it too!
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Piunnp

customer_reviews.title: Cute while it lasted.....
customer_reviews.text: This was a cute little gadget to have while it lasted. It worked for about five weeks and then just stopped and of course, its too late for me to return. Not a happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: Dead in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware . I dont normally write reviews. I just wanted to state my sadness when this fountain quit working less than a month after receiving. Gave to my wife for mothers day. It no longer opperates. I was hoping it would last longer after spending $30 on it. Yes I did check/clean the pump and took out of sun for a whole day and put back and nothing works. If getting one of these dont spend extra money for battery as the solar only units you can find for much less.
customer_reviews.author: Jack S.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty To Watch
customer_reviews.text: Works great and the sounds are quite relaxing. Here in Texas the sun makes it work better but you have to watch the water levels when it is in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: paula dewolf

customer_reviews.title: It’s customer service important to you?? Numerous scratches  out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Have not heard from the company yet -requesting a replacement port please . Product arrived with numerous scratches on it – not happy about it but certainly hope it Doesn’t reflect on the products capability -will update in a few days. DG Day one and as much as I’m enjoying it one of the pieces has already cracked! Is it possible to replace this piece??????
customer_reviews.author: Debbi Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but useless on a cloudy day.
customer_reviews.text: The very small suction cups don't work, so surrounding with stones, as in the picture, is the only way to keep it centered. Also, any passing cloud will shut it down. Next year I will purchase one with battery storage capability.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G.

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: It worked good for about a month then sporadically for the next week or so and does not work at all now. It floats in plenty of water with at least 6 hours of sunshine each day. The pump is not obstructed. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: After trying solar fountains a couple of years ago, I was doubtful that this would work at the attractive price. IT DOES Only thing is, it must be cleaned daily or the intake becomes clogged.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Very short working life.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these fountains as replacements for fountains I had previously purchased and had lasted for over one year. Needless to say, I was very disappointed when 2 of the 3 fountains stopped working after 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: cam

customer_reviews.title: Great bird bath fountain
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little solar powered bird bath fountain. Many diff head options so simple and easy to put together and use. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: BSellers

customer_reviews.title: Easy water feature -- can afford several!
customer_reviews.text: These little fountains start working right out of the box! They are small and quiet and inexpensive enough so that i bought 4 to place in saucers of water around my deck. All together they make a pleasant burbling noise that is relaxing and just loud enough. All my neighbors who have seen them are buying these fountains too!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much. The day I got it I put it in my bird bath. Its so pretty and so easy to use. I'm thinking about getting another one!
customer_reviews.author: Dottie Loverly

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stay in the middle with an embarrassing squirt in the air. I returned!
customer_reviews.author: meadowlark acres

customer_reviews.title: Bird Bath Fountain
customer_reviews.text: Good product. However, need a large diameter bird bath as the Bird fountain pumps the water on to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Battery back up is a must
customer_reviews.text: This solar fountain is perfect for my bird bath. Even after the sun goes away it works for hours thanks to the battery back up. Love love love this product. What an upgrade from the one without the battery back up.
customer_reviews.author: Coles

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our small pond in our backyard and it was easy to install. Love the way that it looks as well.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Stockman

customer_reviews.title: Works great and no problem at all.
customer_reviews.text: I made a bird bath for my mom and this was just perfect. I do not have any complaints about this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. McGehee

customer_reviews.title: Solar Bird bath Fountain
customer_reviews.text: I like it . It is easy to use. only you need is the Sun's ray. I am using it without any attachment ,because I like this way.
customer_reviews.author: warner robins

customer_reviews.title: light weight
customer_reviews.text: Does not work if the sun is not shinning on it. Better for a bird fountain than a horses water tank
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Yates

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get it to work correctly no matter what I tried. It is supposed to shut off when there is no sun but the it would just keep running
customer_reviews.author: P. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Dont work
customer_reviews.text: Item did not work plus there were poor instructions Very disappointed because i was very exited about this item but did not work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cracked out of box
customer_reviews.text: Unit worked for very shot time then stopped. Noticed unit was cracked out of bid on top. Will reorder and try again.
customer_reviews.author: Highbypass Turbofan

customer_reviews.title: Birds love this!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. My bird bath is a big hit with the birds! I did get rid of the tips that are come with this (for different spray patterns). Just the bubbling water seems to work best.
customer_reviews.author: karen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted a couple weeks stop working and made weird noises I threw in the garbage. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Betsy G. Richards

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The fountain is a little underwhelming but the product works as described
customer_reviews.author: Don S.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This fountain worked for a couple of weeks when it felt like it. Now it is completely dead. Don't waste you time and money on this Hiluckey fountain. I bought a second fountain at the same time that was about $10.00 less expensive and that one works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work. Can’t find contact info for Company and would like a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertized
customer_reviews.text: With the battery backup, it even works when the sun goes under the clouds. I bought a big ceramic planter and filled it with water and set it beside our bird bath. It works there better than in the bird bath as I don't have to add water as often.
customer_reviews.author: Midland NC

customer_reviews.title: Still working after a month : )
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the water moving in my birdbath. You can change out the head to make whatever spout you want or take it off. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: kiwi

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after first day
customer_reviews.text: This fountain is not good quality and was a waste of my money. I tried everything to get it to work consistently. It would not hold a charge so the battery backup was a joke. I tried different levels of exposure, lengths of time etc... and just couldn't get it to go. Of course my return window is closed. Don't take the risk.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Lynne Detweiler

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my bird bath. Started working right out of the box. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Tuminello

customer_reviews.title: Love this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: While I wish it was a more neutral color, I love it! It absolutely requires full sun to operate effectively so where you place it is important. I put rocks around the base so it would stay in place and wouldn’t spray all of the water out of it. Loved seeing 4 birds playing in it soon after I put it out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Fountain with a mind of its own
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but the suction cups don’t work and this little solar fountain has a mind of its own sometimes it works and sometimes it doesn’t I would not purchase it again
customer_reviews.author: KKB

customer_reviews.title: Keep water level up if used in a bird bath.
customer_reviews.text: I moved mine to a pond and it works best there. In a bird bath, I had to remember to keep the water level up. I don't know that the birds were particularly attracted to it more but I enjoy watching it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Riley

customer_reviews.title: It worked for aprox 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: There was a short, when you messed with it the pump would work again, unfortunately I purchased it too soon for the season and let it sit in the house for several months so I couldn't return it. It worked fantastic when it worked. Wouldn't buy it again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Llewellyn

customer_reviews.title: Out of box missing sprayer
customer_reviews.text: BUT not only was the sprayer missing but I find it is made in China.
customer_reviews.author: C.Wise

customer_reviews.title: 👎👎
customer_reviews.text: Works for a day then stops. Waste of money. Ive went through 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Sherrill

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Instantly attracted birds to my bird bath. This isn't the Bellagio though, too much sun and the wrong nozzle will empty your birdbath. Perfect for larger ponds/pools though.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product was a big waste of time and money. Three days in direct sunlight and would only work for a couple minutes before batteries went dead. Look for a different brand. Very low quality
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: WORKED FOR A WEEK
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of a solar fountain, but this product only worked for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Love it but needs full sun.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little fountain but it needs to be in full, direct sun to work. Sits well in my birdbath!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peary
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy! So easy to use and it works great. I used in an old wheelbarrow we were getting rid of for a water feature. It's on when sun hits it and off when sun goes down. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: It did exactly what it said it would do.
customer_reviews.text: I used it in a small ornamental bird bath. This didn't work. No fault of the product. In the sun the shallow water got very hot. Also the spray was so high the wind blew all the water away. I then used it without the spray caps in a more shaded area, and all was well.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work 99% of the tme
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get it to work most of the time, even with bright sunlight
customer_reviews.author: Jeepgeek

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product works very well includes customizable pieces to change to your preferred water fountain style... I would definitely recommend this to anyone...
customer_reviews.author: BeeCrafty

customer_reviews.title: A lot of options for the money
customer_reviews.text: This little solar fountain does exactly what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Greta

product_meta.title: Hiluckey Solar Bird Bath Fountain with Battery Backup, 2.5W Free Standing Solar Powered Water Fountain Pump Kit for Birdbath Garden Outdoor
feature_bullets: Solar Powered: Built in 800mAh battery, it can store solar power simultaneously when the fountain is working in full sun, keeping it work continuously and steadily even when there is some clouds come accorss occasionally.

Easy to Use: put the pump in water, it will work automatically in 3s once exposed to sufficient sunlight, up to 20in jet height, perfect for bird bath, fish tank, small pond, pool, garden decoration, water circulation for oxygen.
Sprayer for Different Water Style: 8 spray patterns options allow you to change different water spray display, adding more fun to your garden.
Water-Level Monitoring: With the water-level monitoring system, the fountain will work or shut off automatically according to the water level, no worry about burning out the fountain.
Suggestion: Pls clean the solar fountain frequently to avoid it from blocking. And pls put it in full sun for best working without any shadow..

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.1 out of 5 stars319 ratings3.1 out of 5 stars
